type: Legendary Creature – Human Knight Lord Noble
rules_text:
Reach
[i]Reginleif[/i] – Whenever Ephraim, Restoration King attacks, creatures with toughness 4 or greater can't block this turn.
[i]Siegmund[/i] – As long as Ephraim is tapped, creatures with power 3 or less can't attack you.
Partner with Eirika, Restoration Queen
